author: vors
body:
According to https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/pull/17011 dotnet core 2.0 doesn't have a dependency on openssl for macOS.
When we switch to 2.0, we should revisit
- [ ] crypto deps patching logic
- [ ] install instructions

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Can we close the old Issue?

/cc @SteveL-MSFT

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I don't think this is relevant anymore.  @iSazonov thanks for reviewing our old issues!  Much appreciated!

title: Revisit macOS crypto patching logic and install instructions
